text: The Floridsdorfer Athletiksport-Club (Floridsdorfer Athletics Sports Club) is a football club from Floridsdorf. Floridsdorf is the 21st district of Vienna. The club was founded in August 1904. In November 1905 the name was chanced into Floridsdorfer Athletik-Klub. In June 1906 the 1. Floridsdorfer A.C. became member of the Austrian Football Association.History-Homepage The club colors are blue and white. ==Honours== *Austrian Championship: 1918 *Austrian Football 2nd League Runner up: 2022 ==Current squad== Updated 27 July 2023 ===Coaching staff=== * Mitja Mörec Headcoach * Aleksandar Gitsov Assistant coach * Stefan Hirczy Assistant coach * Lukas Klinger Goalkeeper coach ==League== In brackets level in Austrian football *1947-1954: Staatsliga (1) *1992-2004: Regionalliga Ost (3) *2005-2007: Wiener Stadtliga (4) *2007-2014: Regionalliga Ost (3) *2014- : 2. Liga (2)Transfermarkt.at ==Manager history in the 21st century== * Christian Keglevits (1997-2000) * Erich Obermayer (2000-2001) * Andreas Reisinger (2001) * Rudolf Eggenberger (2001-2004) * Peter Flicker (2004) * Karl Berger (2004) * Peter Flicker (2004-2005) * Werner Gössinger (2006-2007) * Damir Canadi (2007-2008) * Dominik Thalhammer (2008) * Peter Seher (2008) * Andreas Ogris (2008-2010) * Damir Canadi (2010) * Christian Prosenik (2011) * Hans Kleer (2011-2015) * Peter Pacult (2015) * Thomas Flögel (2015) * Felix Gasselich (2015-2016) * Jürgen Halper (2016) * Franz Maresch (2017) * Dominik Glawogger (2017) * Thomas Eidler (2017-2018) * Mario Handl (2018) * Oliver Oberhammer (2018) * Andreas Heraf (2018-2019) * Mario Handl (2019) * Lukas Fischer & Aleksandar Gitsov (2020) * Miron Muslic (2020) * Roman Ellensohn (2021) * Aleksandar Gitsov (2021) * Mitja Mörec (2021-) ==Famous players== * Marko Arnautović * Robert Dienst * Trifon Ivanov * Ernst Ocwirk * Peter Pacult * Krzysztof Ratajczyk ==References== Category:Austrian football clubs Category:Football clubs of Vienna Category:1900s establishments in Austria Category:1904 establishments in Europe
title: Floridsdorfer AC
